##Commonly Used Functions
rep.col<-function(x,n){ #Repeat a row
   matrix(rep(x,each=n), ncol=n, byrow=TRUE)
}
rep.row<-function(x,n){ #Repeat a column
   matrix(rep(x,each=n),nrow=n)
}
